about_the_game:
HOW TO PLAY

Farm Wars is a real-time PVP strategy game where farming meets fierce competition. During the day, you purchase seeds, plant crops, and prepare your defenses. At night, you transform into animals to sabotage your rivals' fields, while they attempt to disrupt yours.

EARLY GAME

At the start of the game, each player sets a price for their fields. These prices are compared, and half of the difference between the highest and lowest prices is added to the starting gold of the player with the lower-priced field. This ensures a strategic balance from the very beginning.

DURING THE GAME

During the day, players can purchase seeds and defensive items from the shop, plant their crops, and prepare for the night ahead. Strategic planning during the day is crucial for withstanding attacks and executing undermine missions at night.

ANIMAL SELECTION

At the beginning of each night, players choose an animal to attack their rival's fields. If a player fails to make a selection within the allotted time, an animal will be randomly assigned. Selecting the same animal for two consecutive nights locks it for the next night, encouraging diverse strategies and adaptability.

NIGHT

During the night phase, players raid their rivals’ fields as their chosen animals. They can attack unprotected areas to destroy crops, but stepping on a hidden mine will kill their animal, preventing further attacks that night.

END GAME

The game ends when a player’s gold reaches the field price set by their rival at the start. If neither player reaches the target by the 10th day, victory goes to the player whose gold is closest to their rival’s field price.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8265U or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10875H or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX2060 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Farm Wars is a real-time PVP strategy game where you compete to outwit your rivals. Plant crops during the day, defend your fields, and transform into animals at night to sabotage your rivals' fields. Outsmart your rivals, sabotage their plans, and dominate the battlefield with clever tactics!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
